Adventurer Helper:
Once you have killed a creatures you need to gather their ash as soon as possible as Priest Ross requires *30 Blazing Swamp Ash* as proof you have cleared some of the monsters in the Blazing Swamp. Once you have them return them to *Priest Ross in Aden`s Einhasad Temple*. He`ll then pay you for your work.
Any questions?
[Quest Q00475_ForTheSacrificed quest_ac|"Nope. I`m starting to notice a theme with these work orders."]
